title: Palmer Penguins

title: penguins: Palmer Penguins — penguins
text: Palmer Penguins dataset contains penguins measurements.

title: penguins: Palmer Penguins — penguins
text: data frame 344 rows 9 variables: rowid Unique identifier assigned penguin observation. (Range: 1 344) species Categorical classification penguin species. (Examples: Adelie, Gentoo, Chinstrap) island Sampling location penguin observation. (Examples: Torgersen, Biscoe, Dream) bill_length_mm Length penguin's bill measured millimeters. (Range: 32.1 59.6) bill_depth_mm Depth penguin's bill measured millimeters. (Range: 13.1 21.5) flipper_length_mm Length penguin's flipper measured millimeters. (Range: 172 231) body_mass_g Body mass penguin measured grams. (Range: 2700 6300) sex Biological sex penguin. (Examples: male, female, NA) year Year penguin observation recorded. (Examples: 2007, 2008, 2009)
